ABOUT.TITLE: About Me
ABOUT.DESCRIPTION_1: Hey there, I'm Alessandro. I'm passionate about coding because it allows me to bring ideas to life through clean, functional design. There's something incredibly satisfying about creating perfectly aligned layouts and smooth user experiences.
ABOUT.DESCRIPTION_2: Beautiful, well-crafted web applications inspire me - they're like puzzles waiting to be reverse-engineered.

SKILLS.DESCRIPTION: I'm experienced with technologies like JavaScript and Angular. I'm working towards becoming a fullstack developer and want to expand my skills. I'm always open to learning new tools and frameworks.

PROJECTS.TITLE: Projects
PROJECTS.DESCRIPTION: Feel free to explore my projects! I focus on building responsive and user-friendly applications with clean, efficient code. Every project is an opportunity to improve and apply best practices.
PROJECTS.JOIN_DESC: Task manager inspired by the Kanban System. Create and organize tasks using drag and drop functions, assign users and categories.
PROJECTS.MAFIA_DESC: Jump, run and shoot game based on object-oriented approach. Help Frank to find coins and ammunition to fight against the orcs, and shot the big Orc in the head.
PROJECTS.DABUBBLE_DESC: This App is a Slack Clone App. It revolutionizes team communication and collaboration with its intuitive interface, real-time messaging, and robust channel organization.

TESTIMONIALS.HEADING: Colleagues' Thoughts
TESTIMONIALS.TEXT_1: Working with Alessandro in the team was inspiring. He worked quickly and with great commitment, never limited himself to just 'his' tasks, and repeatedly contributed clever ideas that noticeably advanced our project.
TESTIMONIALS.TEXT_2: I completed the frontend development training course together with Alessandro. During that time, I got to know him as a very reliable, helpful, and talented colleague.
TESTIMONIALS.TEXT_3: Working with Alessandro was always constructive and inspiring. He has a solid technical understanding, creative ideas and a solution-oriented way of thinking. Reliable, a team player and committed - with him, every project is a succes.

CONTACT.TITLE: CONTACT ME
CONTACT.HEADING: Ready to work together?
CONTACT.DESCRIPTION_1: I'm looking for a role where I can contribute to a motivated team, be part of exciting projects, and continue sharpening my skills as a developer. With my enthusiasm, problem-solving mindset, and attention to detail, I'm confident I can bring real value to your team.
CONTACT.DESCRIPTION_2: I'd love to hear from you and explore how we can build something great together!

JOIN.DESCRIPTION: Task manager inspired by the Kanban System. Create and organize tasks using drag and drop functions, assign users and categories.
JOIN.DETAILS: In this project, I was responsible for developing the login and registration pages and setting up the Firebase database structure. I supported the team in integrating the database across all pages and implemented the core logic for creating, editing, and deleting cards in the database.

MAFIA-VS-ORCS.DESCRIPTION: Jump, run and shoot game based on object-oriented approach. Help Frank to find coins and ammunition to fight against the orcs, and shot the big Orc in the head.
MAFIA-VS-ORCS.DETAILS: I applied an object-oriented approach to structure the game logic and mechanics. This solo project demonstrates my ability to plan structured code, and handle both gameplay design and technical implementation. I plan to expand the game with more levels and increasing difficulty.

DABUBBLE.DESCRIPTION: This App is a Slack Clone App. It revolutionizes team communication and collaboration with its intuitive interface, real-time messaging, and robust channel organization.
DABUBBLE.DETAILS: Short text that describes your role or the workflow for this specific project. Let a recruiter know more about your knowledge and ability to work independently or collaboratively in a structured way.
